trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_SEQ_00<tab>Cicidoa needs a reliable adventurer to deliver a gift to the Coffer & Coffin.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_SEQ_01<tab>To repay a debt of gratitude, Cicidoa wishes to give Roger a pumpkin, which he has purchased from the Royal Plantations.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_SEQ_02<tab>The pumpkin grown at the Royal Plantations is as prodigiously plump as promised. Deliver it to Roger at the Coffer & Coffin.

TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_SEQ_03<tab>Roger thanks you for delivering the pumpkin. He believes that his patrons will benefit from a more balanced diet─though whether or not they will take to the new menu remains to be seen.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_TODO_00<tab>Present the receipt to Gagari.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the pumpkin to Roger.

TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_CICIDOA_000_1<tab>You're an adventurer, yes? If you're not otherwise occupied, I've a favor to ask. I've resolved to repay a debt of gratitude, which I owe to the owner of the Coffer & Coffin.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_CICIDOA_000_2<tab>For this purpose, I've purchased from the Royal Plantations a prodigiously plump pumpkin─a particularly popular piece of produce.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_CICIDOA_000_3<tab>Alas, I cannot part this place to procure and proffer the pumpkin. You see, the scheduled shipment from the Nanawa Mines, for which I wait, is late.

TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_CICIDOA_000_4<tab>I would prevail upon you to pick up the pumpkin in my stead, and see it safely to the Coffer & Coffin. Present this receipt of purchase to Gagari at the Royal Plantations, and she will yield it to you.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_CICIDOA_000_5<tab>I apologize for asking you to attend to this time-consuming task, but I truly appreciate your assistance!
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_GAGARI_000_10<tab>If Cicidoa doesn't come calling soon, this spectacular specimen shall sadly be past its prime...
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_GAGARI_000_11<tab>Oh, so you're to deliver this decadent delight? I can say with confidence that any gourmand would be grateful for such a grand gift.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_GAGARI_000_12<tab>Here is the pumpkin. I hope it meets with Roger's approval.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_GAGARI_000_13<tab>Fresh produce is somewhat scarce in these parts, and as such we are always deluged with demand.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_GAGARI_000_14<tab>You know the way to the Coffer & Coffin, correct? It is beyond the bridge to the northwest. Look for a place where local laborers lounge.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_ROGER_000_50<tab>Drink fer ye, <var 08 E905 ((lassie)) ((laddie)) /var>? Ye won't get better ale or spirits fer yer coin than at me place.

TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_ROGER_000_51<tab>What's that? Wee Cicidoa asked ye to bring this here to me? Ha! Heh, so even that foul-mouthed drunk knows the meanin' o' remorse. Reckon this is fer the time I carried his drink-sodden arse back home.
TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_ROGER_000_52<tab>But hells, an honest-to-gods pumpkin from the Royal Plantations! I can't wait to see what the cooks'll do with her.

TEXT_SUBWIL060_00303_ROGER_000_53<tab>The lads here scoff down beastly amounts o' meat, an' it's startin' to tell on their health. It'll be good to get more vegetables in their bellies─assumin' I can get the stubborn bastards to try somethin' new. Thanks fer the help, <var 08 E905 ((lassie)) ((laddie)) /var>!
